dmca.title: [EV1-C1148027I] Pirated Game Server
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.ev1servers.net/About/dmca.aspx Legal Response Team -----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] Posted At: Saturday, September 30, 2006 6:20 AM Posted To: DMCA Houston Conversation: [EV1-C1148027I] Pirated Game Server Subject: [EV1-C1148027I] Pirated Game Server ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Pirated Game Server Added by system at Thursday, Sep 28 2006 12:17 pm X-MailFrom: maxxlength@yahoo.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [207.218.192.104] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Thu Sep 28 12:03:51 2006 Received: from SMTP32-FWD by mail.ev1.net (SMTP32) id A000009FC; Thu, 28 Sep 2006 12:02:59 -0500 Received: from web58511.mail.re3.yahoo.com [68.142.236.194] by mail.ev1.net (SMTPD32-6.06) id A041E287006C; Thu, 28 Sep 2006 12:02:57 -0500 Received: (qmail 68295 invoked by uid 60001); 28 Sep 2006 17:03:48 -0000 DomainKey-Signature: a=rsa-sha1; q=dns; c=nofws; s=s1024; d=yahoo.com; h=Message-ID:Received:Date:From:Subject:To:Cc:MIME-Version:Content-Type: Content-Transfer-Encoding; Thu, 28 Sep 2006 10:03:48 PDT Date: Thu, 28 Sep 2006 10:03:48 -0700 (PDT) From: Maxx Length Subject: Pirated Game Server To: abuse@ovh.com Cc: postmaster@ovh.com, root@ovh.com, webmaster@ovh.com, support@ovh.com, tech@ovh.net, abuse@ovh.net, postmaster@ovh.net, abuse@hotmail.com, abuse@free.fr, postmaster@free.fr, abuse@proxad.net, abuse@levelupgames.ph, postmaster@levelupgames.ph, report-privateserver@levelupgames.ph, license@gravity.co.kr, business@gravity.co.kr, marketing@gravity.co.kr, gravitypr@gravity.co.kr, erick@gravity.co.kr, abuse@gravity.co.kr, abuse@invisionfree.com, postmaster@invisionfree.com, invfree@invisionfree.com, agent@invisionfree.com, admin@ev1.net, admin2@ev1.net, abuse@ev1.net, postmaster@ev1.net, noc@ev1.net MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="0-799202025-1159463028=:68263" Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit X-Declude-Sender: maxxlength@yahoo.com [68.142.236.194] X-Spam-Tests-Failed: None [0] X-Note: This E-mail was sent from web58511.mail.re3.yahoo.com ([68.142.236.194]). (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) I thought that you should know that your customer is running a pirated server at the IP address of 213.251.174.213 09/28/06 12:36:51 dns 213.251.174.213 nslookup 213.251.174.213 Canonical name: ns34861.ovh.net Addresses: 213.251.174.213 09/28/06 12:48:37 whois 213.251.174.213@whois.ripe.net whois -h whois.ripe.net 213.251.174.213 ... % This is the RIPE Whois query server #2. % The objects are in RPSL format. % % Note: the default output of the RIPE Whois server % is changed. See % http://www.ripe.net/db/news/abuse-proposal-20050331.html % for more details. % % Rights restricted by copyright. % See http://www.ripe.net/db/copyright.html % Note: This output has been filtered. % To receive output for a database update, use the "-B" flag % Information related to '213.251.168.0 - 213.251.175.255' inetnum: 213.251.168.0 - 213.251.175.255 netname: OVH descr: OVH SAS descr: Dedicated Servers descr: http://www.ovh.com country: FR admin-c: OK217-RIPE tech-c: OTC2-RIPE status: ASSIGNED PA mnt-by: OVH-MNT source: RIPE # Filtered role: OVH Technical Contact address: OVH SAS address: 140, Quai du Sartel address: 59100 Roubaix address: France admin-c: OK217-RIPE tech-c: GM84-RIPE nic-hdl: OTC2-RIPE remarks: ======================================== remarks: support : support@ovh.com remarks: 0 899 701 761 (france only) remarks: ======================================== remarks: troubles: remarks: + network : abuse@ovh.net remarks: + spam : http://www.spam-rbl.com remarks: ======================================== remarks: peering : noc@ovh.net remarks: prefix 213.186.32.0/19 remarks: prefix 213.251.128.0/18 remarks: - FreeIX (1Gbs) 213.228.3.244 remarks: - PariX (1Gbs) 198.32.247.104 remarks: - SfinX (1Gbs) 194.68.129.144 remarks: ======================================== abuse-mailbox: abuse@ovh.net mnt-by: OVH-MNT source: RIPE # Filtered person: Octave Klaba address: OVH SAS address: 140, quai du sartel address: 59100 Roubaix address: France phone: +33 3 20 20 09 57 fax-no: +33 3 20 20 09 58 nic-hdl: OK217-RIPE abuse-mailbox: abuse@ovh.net mnt-by: OVH-MNT source: RIPE # Filtered % Information related to '213.251.128.0/18AS16276' route: 213.251.128.0/18 descr: OVH ISP descr: Paris, France origin: AS16276 mnt-by: OVH-MNT source: RIPE # Filtered This server is for an online game called Ragnarok Online. Ragnarok Online is the property of Gravity Online. In the Philippines the ones that run the official servers is Level Up Inc. http://www.ragnarokonline.com/ is the offical Ragnarok Online site. Gravity's Offical website is located at http://www.gravity.co.kr/en/index.asp Gravity Online owns the exclusive rights to Ragnarok Online and they are the only ones that can give authorization for a license to be granted to run such a server. This individaul and many others out there have no such permisison to run these illegal servers and this illegal activity needs to immediately cease. The pirates dropbox at nikt0ut@hotmail.com also needs to be immediately terminated. The other so called private servers are illegal unlicensed copies of the server. The individuals have no permission to be running this software and these illegal activities need to immediately stop. Gravity Online has also been notified about this violation and they quite actively take legal actions against illegal servers such as this. Level Up Inc. And Gravity Online take piracy very seriously http://philgaming.com/index.php/news/Level_Up!_Official_statement_on_ill egal_servers Another good article about this problem is located at http://www.hackenslash.net/online/index.php?story_id=39094 There are several servers running by this individual The game runs on port 6901 and the abusers website is located at http://subwaytovenus.free.fr/ 09/28/06 12:44:37 dns subwaytovenus.free.fr Canonical name: perso124-g5.free.fr Aliases: subwaytovenus.free.fr Addresses: 212.27.63.124 09/28/06 12:45:30 whois 212.27.63.124@whois.ripe.net whois -h whois.ripe.net 212.27.63.124 ... % This is the RIPE Whois query server #2. % The objects are in RPSL format. % % Note: the default output of the RIPE Whois server % is changed. Your tools may need to be adjusted. 212.27.63.255' inetnum: 212.27.60.0 - 212.27.63.255 netname: FR-PROXAD descr: Free SAS (ProXad) descr: internal infrastructure (servers) descr: Paris, France country: FR admin-c: ACP23-RIPE tech-c: TCP8-RIPE status: ASSIGNED PA mnt-by: PROXAD-MNT source: RIPE # Filtered remarks: INFRA-AW role: Administrative Contact for ProXad address: Free SAS / ProXad address: 8, rue de la Ville L'Eveque address: 75008 Paris phone: +33 1 73 50 20 00 fax-no: +33 1 73 50 25 01 remarks: trouble: Information: http://www.proxad.net/ remarks: trouble: Spam/Abuse requests: mailto:abuse@proxad.net admin-c: RA999-RIPE tech-c: NH1184-RIPE nic-hdl: ACP23-RIPE mnt-by: PROXAD-MNT source: RIPE # Filtered abuse-mailbox: abuse@proxad.net role: Technical Contact for ProXad address: Free SAS / ProXad address: 8, rue de la Ville L'Eveque address: 75008 Paris phone: +33 1 73 50 20 00 fax-no: +33 1 73 50 25 01 remarks: trouble: Information: http://www.proxad.net/ remarks: trouble: Spam/Abuse requests: mailto:abuse@proxad.net admin-c: RA999-RIPE tech-c: NH1184-RIPE nic-hdl: TCP8-RIPE mnt-by: PROXAD-MNT source: RIPE # Filtered abuse-mailbox: abuse@proxad.net % Information related to '212.27.32.0/19AS12322' route: 212.27.32.0/19 descr: ProXad network / Free SA descr: Paris, France origin: AS12322 mnt-by: PROXAD-MNT source: RIPE # Filtered The individual also has a forum running at http://s11.invisionfree.com/NiktoutRO/index.php for this illegal pirated server. 09/28/06 12:58:24 dns s11.invisionfree.com Mail for s11.invisionfree.com is handled by mail.invisionfree.com Canonical name: s11.invisionfree.com Addresses: 209.85.48.6 09/28/06 12:58:41 IP block s11.invisionfree.com Trying 209.85.48.6 at ARIN Trying 209.85.48 at ARIN OrgName: Everyones Internet OrgID: EVRY Address: 390 Benmar Address: Suite 200 City: Houston StateProv: TX PostalCode: 77060 Country: US NetRange: 209.85.0.0 - 209.85.127.255 CIDR: 209.85.0.0/17 NetName: EVRY-BLK-15 NetHandle: NET-209-85-0-0-1 Parent: NET-209-0-0-0-0 NetType: Direct Allocation NameServer: NS1.EV1.NET NameServer: NS2.EV1.NET Comment: RegDate: 2005-12-14 Updated: 2006-07-17 RTechHandle: RW172-ARIN RTechName: Williams, Randy RTechPhone: +1-713-579-2850 RTechEmail: admin@ev1.net OrgAbuseHandle: ABUSE477-ARIN OrgAbuseName: Abuse OrgAbusePhone: +1-713-579-2850 OrgAbuseEmail: abuse@ev1.net OrgNOCHandle: NOC1445-ARIN OrgNOCName: NOC OrgNOCPhone: +1-713-579-2850 OrgNOCEmail: noc@ev1.net OrgTechHandle: RW172-ARIN OrgTechName: Williams, Randy OrgTechPhone: +1-713-579-2850 OrgTechEmail: admin@ev1.net OrgTechHandle: VST3-ARIN OrgTechName: Stinson, Valarie OrgTechPhone: +1-713-579-2850 OrgTechEmail: admin2@ev1.net # ARIN WHOIS database, last updated 2006-09-27 19:10 # Enter ? for additional hints on searching ARIN's WHOIS database. This forum also needs to be immediately terminated. ALL services to this Pirated server needs to be immediately terminated. Including DNS and any Webhosting. Any kind of support to this pirated server is not acceptable. A typical Licensing agreement would look like this http://contracts.onecle.com/gravity/pt-lyto.lic.2004.10.29.shtml If thier customer is not able to provide such documentation then they are not running a licensed legal Ragarnok Online server. I do not believe thier customer has such a license since the server is a free server to play on and since the licensing is 1 million dollars a year to be a licensed Ragarnok Online server I doubt this server is licensed and is a pirated server. They legally can not use the Raganok Online name or any of thier characters or trademarks. This server is in violation of the law and is to be immediately removed. So at this point it is time that law enforcement take this matter over and ensure that all ISPs involved are punished to the fullest extent of the law. For privacy issues all law enforcement has been BCCed on this complaint. For all the ISPs / Hosters mentioned above please immediately remove all access to these illegal activity. All ISP / Web Hosters have now been properly notified about this abuse and the proper steps needs to be taken now to stop it. Maxx --------------------------------- Talk is cheap. Use Yahoo! Messenger to make PC-to-Phone calls. Great rates starting at 1¢/min. MIME element (text/html) I thought that you should know that your customer is running
a  pirated server at the IP address of 213.251.174.213

This server is for an online game called Ragnarok Online.
Ragnarok Online is the property of Gravity Online.
In the Philippines the ones that run the official servers is
Level Up Inc.

http://www.ragnarokonline.com/ is the offical Ragnarok Online
site.  Gravity's Offical website is located at
http://www.gravity.co.kr/en /index.asp

Gravity Online owns the exclusive rights to Ragnarok Online and
they are the only ones that can give authorization for a license to be
granted to run such a server. This individaul and many others out there
have no such permisison to run these illegal servers and this illegal
activity needs to immediately cease.

The pirates dropbox at nikt0ut@hotmail.com
also needs to be immediately terminated.

The other  so called private servers are illegal unlicensed
copies of the server. The individuals have no permission to be
running this software  and these illegal activities need
to immediately stop.

Gravity Online has also been notified about this violation and they
quite actively take legal actions against illegal servers such as this.

Level Up Inc. And Gravity Online take piracy very seriously
http://philgaming.com/index.php/news/Level_Up!_Off icial_statement_on_illegal_servers

Another good article about this problem is located at
http:/ /www.hackenslash.net/online/index.php?story_id=39094
There are several servers running by this individual

The game runs on port 6901 and the abusers
website is located at  http://subwaytovenus.free.fr/

This forum also needs to be immediately terminated.

ALL services to this Pirated server needs to be immediately
terminated.  Including DNS and any Webhosting. Any kind of
support to this pirated server is not acceptable.
A typical Licensing agreement would look like this

http://contracts.onecle.com/gravity/pt-lyto.lic.2004.10.29.shtml

If thier customer is not able to provide such documentation then
they are not running a licensed legal Ragarnok Online server.
I do not believe thier customer has such a license since the server
is a free server to play on and since the licensing is 1 million dollars
a year to be a licensed Ragarnok Online server I doubt this server is
licensed and is a pirated server. They legally can not use the Raganok
Online name or any of thier characters or trademarks. This server is in
violation of the law and is to be immediately removed.

So at this point it is time that law enforcement take this matter over
and ensure that all ISPs involved are punished to the fullest extent of the
law.

For privacy issues all law enforcement has been BCCed on this
complaint.

For all the ISPs / Hosters mentioned above please immediately remove
all access to these illegal activity.  All ISP / Web Hosters have now been
properly notified about this abuse and the proper steps needs to be
taken now to stop it.
